tool_description: Simple and straight, Roll dice and get a random number from dice among 1 to 6. It also has text to pronounce audio while getting numbers.
title: Roll Dice

api_list.name: rollDice
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://roll-dice1.p.rapidapi.com/rollDice"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "roll-dice1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
